articles.author: Axios
articles.title: CNN cuts ties with Rick Santorum over comments about Native Americans - Axios
articles.description: Santorum said last month, "We birthed a nation from nothing," adding "there isn't much Native American culture in American culture."
articles.content:
CNN has dropped Rick Santorum as a senior political commentator amid controversy over recent disparaging remarks the former senator made about Native Americans.

articles.title: COVID overwhelms Latin America, Caribbean as region hits 1M casualties - New York Post
articles.description: The Latin American and Caribbean region hit the dire and deadly milestone on Friday. Now, South America has the highest deaths per capita from COVID-19.
